name: Indopendence - demo
description:
Play the Indonesian competition on your screen with pixelated fun game! fun to play for everyone! the fun on Indonesian Independence will never end! but there's some problem in the fun. something is coming....

--------------------------CONTROLS--------------------------

           Space and (WASD/IJKL/Arrow keys)

----------------------------ATTENTION!---------------------------

This is just a demo the real game will be released at 8/17/2020. If there's a bug or a glitch or a problem tell us on the comments and uhh have fun!
